name: Process Engineering Ontology
description: Comprehensive ontology for defining, orchestrating, and optimizing business processes with agentic AI augmentation, supporting cradle-to-grave process management from vision through execution and continuous improvement
creator: Platform Foundation Core - Ontology Architect Agent
domain: Business Process Management, Process Engineering, Agentic Orchestration
purpose: Enable systematic process definition, AI-augmented execution, quality gate enforcement, hypothesis validation, and continuous process optimization across PF-Core platform instances

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: schema.org Action provides foundational process execution model; Project captures initiatives; Event models process instances; Thing serves as base for artifacts; DefinedTermSet for classifications

vsom.vision: Enable AI-driven business transformation through systematic process engineering

entities.name: Process
entities.description: A structured, repeatable sequence of activities and decision points that transforms inputs into outputs to achieve specific business outcomes, optimized through AI augmentation and continuous improvement

properties.name: processId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the process definition

properties.name: processName
properties.description: Human-readable name of the process

properties.name: processType
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property needed to classify process categories beyond schema.org Action types
properties.description: Classification of process purpose and domain

properties.name: description
properties.description: Comprehensive description of process purpose, scope, and expected outcomes

properties.name: businessObjective
properties.propertyRationale: Links to VSOM strategic objectives for alignment
properties.description: Strategic business objective this process supports
properties.example: Reduce time-to-MVP from 90 days to 14 days through AI-augmented development

properties.name: scope
properties.description: Boundaries and coverage of the process - what's included and excluded
properties.example: Covers domain definition through deployment; excludes ongoing maintenance

properties.name: owner
properties.description: Person or role accountable for process definition and outcomes

properties.name: stakeholders
properties.description: List of stakeholders involved or impacted by the process

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current lifecycle status of the process definition

properties.name: version
properties.description: Semantic version of process definition (MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH)

properties.name: estimatedDuration
properties.description: Expected duration for complete process execution

properties.name: automationLevel
properties.propertyRationale: Custom metric for AI augmentation percentage
properties.description: Percentage of process activities augmented or automated by AI (0-100)

entities.name: ProcessPhase
entities.description: A distinct stage within a process that groups related activities, has specific deliverables, and includes quality gates for progression control

properties.name: phaseId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the phase within process

properties.name: phaseName
properties.description: Human-readable phase name

properties.name: phaseNumber
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for phase sequencing in process flow
properties.description: Sequential position in process (1, 2, 3...)

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of phase purpose, activities, and expected outcomes

properties.name: entryConditions
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for gate conditions not in schema.org
properties.description: Prerequisites that must be satisfied before phase can begin

properties.name: exitConditions
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for completion criteria
properties.description: Criteria that must be met to complete phase and progress

properties.name: activities
properties.description: List of specific activities performed in this phase

properties.name: estimatedDuration
properties.description: Expected duration for phase completion

properties.name: parallelExecution
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property to indicate concurrent phase execution capability
properties.description: Whether this phase can execute in parallel with other phases

properties.name: parallelWith
properties.description: List of phase IDs that can execute concurrently with this phase

entities.name: ProcessArtifact
entities.description: Tangible output or deliverable produced by a process phase, serving as evidence of completion and input to downstream activities

properties.name: artifactId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the artifact

properties.name: artifactName
properties.description: Human-readable artifact name

properties.name: artifactType
properties.propertyRationale: Custom classification for artifact types relevant to process engineering
properties.description: Classification of artifact format and purpose

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of artifact content, purpose, and usage

properties.name: format
properties.description: File format or media type of the artifact

properties.name: location
properties.description: Storage location or access URL for the artifact

properties.name: version
properties.description: Version identifier for artifact versioning

properties.name: mandatory
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property to indicate if artifact is required for process completion
properties.description: Whether artifact is mandatory for process completion

properties.name: qualityCriteria
properties.description: Specific quality standards the artifact must meet

entities.name: ProcessGate
entities.description: Decision point or quality checkpoint that controls progression between process phases, enforcing quality standards and completion criteria

properties.name: gateId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the gate

properties.name: gateName
properties.description: Human-readable gate name

properties.name: gateType
properties.propertyRationale: Custom classification for different gate purposes
properties.description: Type of gate and evaluation criteria

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of gate purpose, criteria, and decision process

properties.name: criteria
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for gate pass/fail criteria
properties.description: Specific criteria that must be satisfied to pass the gate

properties.name: threshold
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for quantitative gate thresholds
properties.description: Percentage threshold for passing (0-100)

properties.name: automated
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property to indicate if gate evaluation is automated
properties.description: Whether gate evaluation can be fully automated

properties.name: approver
properties.description: Person or role responsible for gate approval decision

properties.name: escalationPath
properties.description: Escalation process if gate fails multiple times
properties.example: After 2 failures, escalate to Process Owner

properties.name: blockingFactor
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for gate severity level
properties.description: Impact level if gate fails - blocking prevents progression

entities.name: ProcessMetric
entities.description: Measurable indicator that tracks process performance, efficiency, quality, or business outcome achievement

properties.name: metricId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the metric

properties.name: metricName
properties.description: Human-readable metric name

properties.name: metricType
properties.propertyRationale: Custom classification for metric categorization
properties.description: Classification of metric purpose and measurement type

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of what the metric measures and why it matters

properties.name: formula
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for metric calculation logic
properties.description: Calculation formula or measurement methodology

properties.name: unit
properties.description: Unit of measurement for the metric

properties.name: target
properties.description: Target value or goal for the metric

properties.name: threshold
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for multi-level thresholds (green/yellow/red)
properties.description: Threshold values for status indication

properties.name: collectionMethod
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for data collection approach
properties.description: Method used to collect metric data

properties.name: frequency
properties.description: How often the metric is measured or reported

properties.name: okrAlignment
properties.propertyRationale: Links metric to OKR framework for strategic alignment
properties.description: Reference to aligned OKR or Key Result

entities.name: AIAgent
entities.description: Artificial intelligence agent that augments or automates process activities, with defined capabilities, autonomy levels, and coordination protocols

properties.name: agentId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the AI agent

properties.name: agentName
properties.description: Human-readable agent name

properties.name: agentType
properties.propertyRationale: Custom classification for agent specialization
properties.description: Primary function category of the agent

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of agent capabilities, scope, and intended use

properties.name: capabilities
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for specific agent skills
properties.description: List of specific capabilities and skills the agent possesses

properties.name: autonomyLevel
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for agent autonomy classification
properties.description: Level of independence in agent operation

properties.name: model
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for underlying AI model identification
properties.description: Underlying AI model or technology

properties.name: coordinationProtocol
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for multi-agent coordination patterns
properties.description: Protocol for coordinating with other agents

properties.name: inputRequirements
properties.description: Required inputs for agent operation

properties.name: outputFormats
properties.description: Formats and types of outputs produced by agent

properties.name: qualityThreshold
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for agent output quality requirements
properties.description: Minimum quality score for agent outputs (0-100)

entities.name: ProcessInstance
entities.description: Specific execution of a process definition, tracking actual progress, performance, and outcomes for a particular initiative or project

properties.name: instanceId
properties.description: Unique identifier for this process execution

properties.name: instanceName
properties.description: Human-readable name for this execution

properties.name: status
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for process execution status tracking
properties.description: Current execution status of process instance

properties.name: currentPhase
properties.description: Phase currently being executed

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: Date and time when process instance was initiated

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: Date and time when process instance completed or failed

properties.name: progress
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for overall completion percentage
properties.description: Overall completion percentage (0-100)

properties.name: actualMetrics
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for storing actual performance data
properties.description: Actual metric values achieved during execution

properties.name: blockers
properties.description: Current blockers preventing progress

properties.name: risks
properties.description: Identified risks to successful completion

properties.name: lessons
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for continuous improvement insights
properties.description: Lessons learned during execution for process improvement
example: Early schema.org validation reduced rework by 40%

entities.name: Hypothesis
entities.description: Testable assumption about process improvement or outcome prediction, validated through systematic measurement during process execution

properties.name: hypothesisId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the hypothesis

properties.name: statement
properties.description: Clear statement of the hypothesis being tested
properties.example: AI-generated scaffolds reduce development time by 60%

properties.name: description
properties.description: Detailed description of hypothesis rationale and expected impact

properties.name: measurementMethod
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for validation methodology
properties.description: How the hypothesis will be measured and validated
properties.example: Measure time from requirements to working prototype

properties.name: target
properties.description: Target outcome that would validate the hypothesis

properties.name: status
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for hypothesis lifecycle tracking
properties.description: Current validation status of the hypothesis

properties.name: evidence
properties.description: Collected evidence supporting or refuting the hypothesis

properties.name: confidence
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for statistical confidence level
properties.description: Statistical confidence in hypothesis validation (0-100%)

properties.name: linkedMetrics
properties.description: Process metrics used to validate this hypothesis

entities.name: ValueChain
entities.description: Sequence of value-adding activities that transform inputs through processes to create customer value and business outcomes

properties.name: valueChainId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the value chain

properties.name: valueChainName
properties.description: Human-readable value chain name

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of value created and customer needs addressed

properties.name: customerValue
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for explicit value proposition
properties.description: Explicit statement of value delivered to customers
properties.example: Enable rapid MVP development with 10x faster time-to-market

properties.name: inputs
properties.description: Required inputs at start of value chain

properties.name: outputs
properties.description: Outputs delivered at end of value chain

properties.name: strategicAlignment
properties.propertyRationale: Links value chain to VSOM strategic objectives
properties.description: Reference to strategic objective this value chain supports

entities.name: ProcessPattern
entities.description: Reusable process template or best practice pattern that can be adapted across different contexts, capturing proven approaches and lessons learned

properties.name: patternId
properties.description: Unique identifier for the process pattern

properties.name: patternName
properties.description: Human-readable pattern name

properties.name: description
properties.description: Description of pattern purpose, context, and benefits

properties.name: context
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for pattern applicability context
properties.description: Situation or context where this pattern is most effective
properties.example: Iterative development with frequent stakeholder feedback

properties.name: problem
properties.description: Problem or challenge this pattern addresses
properties.example: Managing changing requirements and ensuring continuous delivery

properties.name: solution
properties.description: Solution approach defined by the pattern
properties.example: Time-boxed iterations with planning, execution, review, and retrospective

properties.name: benefits
properties.description: Key benefits achieved by applying this pattern

properties.name: antiPatterns
properties.propertyRationale: Custom property for common mistakes to avoid
properties.description: Common anti-patterns or mistakes to avoid

properties.name: relatedPatterns
properties.description: Related patterns that complement or extend this pattern

relationships.description: A process contains one or more ordered phases that structure its execution
A phase produces zero or more artifacts as deliverables
A phase has zero or more quality gates controlling progression
A process tracks one or more metrics to measure performance and outcomes
A phase can be augmented or automated by zero or more AI agents
A phase can have dependencies on zero or more other phases that must complete first
A process definition can have zero or more execution instances
A process can validate zero or more hypotheses through measurement
A hypothesis is measured by one or more process metrics
A process can be part of zero or one value chain
A value chain includes one or more processes
A process can implement zero or more reusable patterns
An artifact can serve as input to zero or more downstream phases
An AI agent can coordinate with zero or more other agents
A process supports external entities like VSOM objectives, OKRs, or organizational initiatives

businessRules.name: Phase Sequence Validation
businessRules.description: IF a phase has dependencies THEN all dependency phases must be completed before this phase can begin

businessRules.name: Gate Enforcement
businessRules.description: IF a phase has blocking gates THEN all blocking gates must pass before phase can complete and next phase can begin

businessRules.name: Mandatory Artifact Production
businessRules.description: IF an artifact is marked as mandatory THEN phase cannot complete until artifact is produced and validated

businessRules.name: Metric Threshold Monitoring
businessRules.description: IF actual metric value falls below threshold THEN generate alert and trigger escalation path

businessRules.name: Automation Level Target
businessRules.description: IF automation level falls below target THEN identify manual activities for AI augmentation opportunities

businessRules.name: Hypothesis Validation
businessRules.description: IF hypothesis status is active THEN collect evidence from each process instance execution

businessRules.name: Parallel Phase Execution
businessRules.description: IF phase has parallelExecution=true AND dependencies are met THEN phase can execute concurrently with other parallel phases

businessRules.name: Agent Autonomy Supervision
businessRules.description: IF AI agent has autonomyLevel=supervised THEN agent outputs require human review before downstream use

businessRules.name: Process Instance Blockers
businessRules.description: IF process instance has blockers THEN status must be 'blocked' until blockers are resolved

businessRules.name: Value Chain Completeness
businessRules.description: IF process is part of value chain THEN all upstream processes in value chain must be defined

businessRules.name: Circular Dependency Prevention
businessRules.description: IF phase A depends on phase B AND phase B depends on phase A THEN reject configuration as circular dependency

businessRules.name: Process Pattern Compliance
businessRules.description: IF process implements pattern THEN process structure should align with pattern's solution approach
